com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Class SproutsFaces

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.SproutsFaces

  • public final class SproutsFaces
extends Object
    Faces of a graph.

         new SproutsFaces(new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList(edges)));

    • Method Detail

      • faces

        public Set<Set<SproutsEdge>> faces()
        Builds and returns graph faces from the edges passed through the constructor.
        Returns:
        the faces of a graph

      • drawnIn

        public Set<SproutsEdge> drawnIn(SproutsEdge submove)
        Returns the face in which the submove is drawn.

        A submove is drawn into a face that contains the first directed edge after the submove - next.

        next is defined as: 

         // Map<Vertex, SproutsRotations> rotations = ...
 SproutsEdge next = rotations.get(submove.from()).next(submove);
        Parameters:
        submove - A submove in the game of sprouts (see Submove.asEdge()). The submove need not be completed.
        Returns:
        the face in which this submove is drawn as a set of directed edges
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if submove is not connected to the graph whose faces are represented by this object

      • findFirstCobwebEdgeInTwoFaces

        public SproutsEdge findFirstCobwebEdgeInTwoFaces(Color cobwebColor)
        Finds a pair of cobweb edges that reside in two separate faces and returns either one of the edges in a pair as a result.

        If there are multiple such pairs, only one is detected. Which one exactly is undefined.

        If such a pair does not exist, this method returns null

        Parameters:
        cobwebColor - the colour of the cobweb edges
        Returns:
        returns one edge from a pair of opposite cobweb edges that reside in two separate faces
